source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000010_CID<tab>Ah, excellent timing! We've just finished our work on the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>. She's so much improved, I've decided to give her a new name to suit:
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000010_CID<tab>Hier, seht nur! Sie ist so umfassend verbessert, dass ich ihr einen neuen Namen gegeben habe ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000020_CID<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var>! Or simply the <var 1A 02 /var>Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var>, if pressed for time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000020_CID<tab>Die „<var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var>“! ... Oder einfach „<var 1A 02 /var>Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var>“, wenn euch das zu lang ist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000030_CID<tab>Once again, she'll carry Eorzea's protectors into battle!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000030_CID<tab>Sie wird euch an den Ort der großen Konfrontation bringen ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000040_WEDGE<tab>All aboard!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000040_WEDGE<tab>Also dann, alle Mann an Bord!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000050_EDMONT<tab>I can do no more than see you off with prayers for your safety and success.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000050_EDMONT<tab>Ab hier muss ich euch alleine ziehen lassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000060_EDMONT<tab>Yet know that wheresoever you may go, my son's spirit goes with you. May the Fury grant you strength!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000060_EDMONT<tab>Aber meine Gebete werden euch begleiten - und ich bin sicher, dass auch Haurchefant im Geiste bei euch sein wird. Viel Glück.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000070_AYMERIC<tab>Return to us─all of you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000070_AYMERIC<tab>Möge eure Mission von Erfolg gekrönt sein!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000080_CID<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var>...engage!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000080_CID<tab>Also dann - Abflug!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100010_CID<tab>This is it! Get ready!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100010_CID<tab>Gleich ist es so weit, Leute!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100020_ESTINIEN<tab>Eye of mine enemy! Render unto me thy power!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100020_ESTINIEN<tab>Zeig mir deine Kraft, Auge!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100030_ESTINIEN<tab>Ugh... No... You will not claim me! I am the master!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100030_ESTINIEN<tab>Ahnng ... Du wirst <var 1A 02 /var>mir<var 1A 01 /var> gehorchen ...! <var 1A 02 /var>Ich<var 1A 01 /var> bin dein Meister!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100040_CID<tab>Yaaaaaargh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100040_CID<tab>Yaaaahaaaaaaaarr!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100050_ALPHINAUD<tab>We're through!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wir sind durch!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100060_BIGGS<tab>Chief! We've got an imperial battleship on our tail! And it's bleedin' <var 1A 02 /var>massive<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100060_BIGGS<tab>Ich glaub, mein Schweinchen pfeift! Die Garlear!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100070_CID<tab>Damn it! The bastards were waiting for us to open the door for them!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100070_CID<tab>Verflucht noch mal! Die haben bloß darauf gewartet, dass wir ihnen den roten Teppich ausrollen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100080_CID<tab>I'm going to try to shake them! Hang on to something!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100080_CID<tab>Die schütteln wir schon ab. Haltet euch fest!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100090_WEDGE<tab>Uwaaaaaah! We're all going to die! Tataruuu!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100090_WEDGE<tab>Uuuuuaaaaahhhh! Gleich schießen sie uns ab! Tataruuu!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100100_BIGGS<tab>She won't take much more of this!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100100_BIGGS<tab>Verdammt, das halten wir nicht mehr lange durch!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100110_ICEHEART<tab>The time is come to use Hydaelyn's gift.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100110_ICEHEART<tab>(-???-)Die Zeit ist gekommen, dein Geschenk einzusetzen, Hydaelyn ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100120_ICEHEART<tab>Much blood has been spilled in my name. And for what? For a false cause that I created for want of the warmth of companionship.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100120_ICEHEART<tab>Für all die Opfer, die mein einfältiger Glaube an meine selbsterschaffene Gerechtigkeit forderte ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100130_ICEHEART<tab>Saint Shiva...Hraesvelgr... Pray forgive this fool.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100130_ICEHEART<tab>Shiva ... Hraesvelgr - Bitte verzeiht mir ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100140_ICEHEART<tab>But even now, I cannot let go of my dream─my dream of a tomorrow in which no child need freeze alone in the snow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100140_ICEHEART<tab>Selbst jetzt wünsche ich mir nur, dass all die kalten Herzen sich erwärmen ... in einer Zeit des wahren Friedens.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100150_ICEHEART<tab>Thank you, Hraesvelgr.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100150_ICEHEART<tab>Danke, Hraesvelgr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Is that...Ysayle? What does she mean to do!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ist ... Ist das Ysayle?! Was hat sie vor?

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100170_ICEHEART<tab>O goddess born of mine own hopes and dreams.
For the last time, I beseech you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100170_ICEHEART<tab>Oh Göttin, Geschöpf meiner Wünsche und Träume - noch einmal bitte ich dich!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100180_ICEHEART<tab>Fill this vessel with your light! Still the hatred
within our hearts and bless us with eternal grace!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100180_ICEHEART<tab>Erfülle meinen Körper mit göttlicher Kraft, o Shiva! Für den wahren, immerwährenden Frieden!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100190_ICEHEART<tab>Farewell, Warrior of Light. And thank you─for showing me the way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100190_ICEHEART<tab>Leb wohl, <var 08 E905 ((Kriegerin)) ((Krieger)) /var> des Lichts! Du hast mir den Weg gezeigt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100200_ALPHINAUD<tab>NOOOOOO!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ysayle!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100210_YSHTOLA<tab>This aether... It was a Crystal of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100210_YSHTOLA<tab>Dieser Äther ...! Sie hat einen Lichtkristall benutzt ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100220_YSHTOLA<tab>She, too, was one of Hydaelyn's chosen...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100220_YSHTOLA<tab>Auch sie war geführt von Hydaelyn ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100230_ESTINIEN<tab>Fare you well, my lady.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100230_ESTINIEN<tab>Ruhe in Frieden, Eisherz.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200010_REGULA<tab>Our objective lies at the heart of the isle.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200010_REGULA<tab>Noch einmal: Unser Ziel liegt im Zentrum von Azys Lla.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200020_REGULA<tab>The Third will remain to guard the ship, while the Second patrols the perimeter and eliminates any threats.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200020_REGULA<tab>Die Dritte Einheit bleibt hier und bewacht das Schiff. Die Zweite schwärmt aus und beseitigt die allagischen Fallen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200030_REGULA<tab>The First will come with me to secure the research facility.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200030_REGULA<tab>Die Erste Einheit kommt mit mir. Wir sichern das For<var 16 /var>schungs<var 16 /var>labor.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200040_REGULA<tab>Let no man doubt the import of our mission: the Allagans found a means to capture eikons alive, and their knowledge lies hid upon this isle.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200040_REGULA<tab>Wenn die Informationen des Frumentariums stimmen, finden wir dort die Antwort darauf, wie die Allager es schafften, Primae lebendig zu fesseln.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200050_REGULA<tab>If we can but acquire it, we would be able to prevent the beings from returning to plague us, thus ending the cycle of rebirth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200050_REGULA<tab>Diese ätherfressenden Parasiten gilt es auszumerzen, das ist unsere oberste Weisung. Der Wahn ihrer missgeleiteten Lakaien hat sie bisher wieder und wieder auferstehen lassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200060_REGULA<tab>I need not remind you that success will raise our legion high in the Emperor's regard.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200060_REGULA<tab>Wenn wir aber das Geheimnis der Allager herausfinden, können wir den Kreislauf ihrer Wiedergeburt durchbrechen ... und uns den ewigen Dank des Kaisers sichern!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200070_REGULA<tab>Yet, by the same token, His Radiance does not tolerate failure. That is all. All troops, prepare for deployment!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200070_REGULA<tab>Doch so großzügig der Kaiser Erfolge belohnt, so wenig verzeiht er Niederlagen. Sorgen wir dafür, dass wir mit der richtigen Nachricht vor seinen Thron treten können!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200080_YSHTOLA<tab>So that is their purpose.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200080_YSHTOLA<tab>Das Wissen, wie man Primae lebendig fesselt! Darauf haben es die Garlear also abgesehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200090_ALPHINAUD<tab>To think that the knowledge used to bind no less a being than Bahamut sleeps here...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dann liegt hier auch die Antwort auf die Frage verborgen, wie die Allager Bahamut in ihren künstlichen Mond bannen konnten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200100_YSHTOLA<tab>Imprisoning a primal in such a manner would represent an effective means to halt the cycle of summoning─were it not for the grave and obvious risks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200100_YSHTOLA<tab>So könnte man wohl tatsächlich verhindern, dass ein Primae erneut beschworen wird ... Vielleicht ist das die Lösung, nach der wir so lange gesucht haben ...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed. We need but refer to past experience─that of Bahamut's calamitous return─to see why this is not the solution we seek.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nein, Y'shtola, das kann nicht die Lösung sein. Denk doch daran, welches Leid Bahamut über Eorzea gebracht hat. Wir dürfen die Siebte Katastrophe niemals vergessen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200120_YSHTOLA<tab>Held in duress, a primal will continue to nurse its hatred for mankind. And when it inevitably breaks free, its rage will be beyond quelling.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200120_YSHTOLA<tab>Hm, du hast wohl Recht. Eine so lange Zeit in Gefangenschaft lässt den Hass eines jeden Wesens ins Unermessliche wachsen ... das Risiko ist zu groß.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200130_ESTINIEN<tab>Whatever folly the Garleans mean to commit, they can wait. We must remain focused on our task.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200130_ESTINIEN<tab>Unser Ziel ist der Papst. Wenn wir uns <var 1A 02 /var>jetzt<var 1A 01 /var> mit den Garlearn anlegen, lacht <var 1A 02 /var>er<var 1A 01 /var> sich ins Fäustchen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Yes, of course. It would not be polite to keep the archbishop waiting.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ja, natürlich. Erst halten wir ihn auf, danach kümmern wir uns um die Garlear.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_300010_REGULA<tab>That would explain my men's silence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_300010_REGULA<tab>Dacht' ich's mir doch. Deswegen kam auf einmal keine Nachricht mehr von meinem Trupp.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_300020_REGULA<tab>We meet again. And this time, we will not be interrupted.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_300020_REGULA<tab>Beim letzten Mal wurden wir unterbrochen, aber diesmal haben wir viel Zeit füreinander ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_300030_REGULA<tab>Come! Show me your power, champions of Eorzea!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_300030_REGULA<tab>Zeig mir doch mal, was <var 08 E905 ((eine Kriegerin)) ((einen Krieger)) /var> des Lichts so besonders macht!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400010_REGULA<tab>I had heard the tales of your strength, Warrior of Light. And now that I have experienced it firsthand, van Baelsar's defeat seems less inexplicable.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400010_REGULA<tab>Gar nicht so übel - fast heldenhaft. Nun scheint mir die Niederlage van Baelsars schon erklärlicher.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400020_REGULA<tab>You are a formidable foe, and I have thoroughly enjoyed our time together. Alas, all good things must come to an end. Allagan secrets await, and there is no profit to be had in remaining here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400020_REGULA<tab>Tja, es war mir ein Vergnügen, aber nun muss leider Schluss sein. Wenn ich erst die Primae-Technologie in Händen halte, hat mir dieser Ort ohnehin nichts mehr zu bieten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400030_REGULA<tab>Keep them occupied!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400030_REGULA<tab>Beschäftigt sie eine Weile, Männer!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400040_ESTINIEN<tab>Coward...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400040_ESTINIEN<tab>Er hält uns hin, um Zeit zu gewinnen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400050_YSHTOLA<tab>It would seem we have no choice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400050_YSHTOLA<tab>Aber wir haben wohl keine Wahl!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400060_ALPHINAUD<tab>You must continue on. We will hold them here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Du läufst weiter. Wir halten sie hier auf!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400070_ESTINIEN<tab>Take the Eye. It should still hold enough energy to be of use to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400070_ESTINIEN<tab>Hier - nimm das. Du wirst es brauchen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400080_ESTINIEN<tab>I shall join you as soon as I am able.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400080_ESTINIEN<tab>Das Durchbrechen der Barriere hat einen Teil seiner Kraft verbraucht, aber vielleicht bringt es dir Glück. Geh schon, ich bin gleich bei dir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400090_YSHTOLA<tab>Enough talk! Make haste and stop the archbishop!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400090_YSHTOLA<tab>Los jetzt! Keine Zeit für lange Reden! Halt den Papst auf!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500010_TIAMAT<tab>(-???-)Who cometh to this forsaken place and disturbeth my solitude?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500010_TIAMAT<tab>Seit Tausenden von Jahren bin ich an diesem verfluchten Ort gefesselt, vergessen ... Wer kommt nun, um mich zu verspotten?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Tiamat, my child.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Tiamat, meine Tochter ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500030_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)...Father? Can it truly be you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500030_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Vater! Bist du das?!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>None other. My form is such that I may journey with Hydaelyn's chosen─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Ich bin es ... Mein Geist begleitet Hydaelyns erwähltes Kind in dieser Gestalt<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500050_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>A mortal who desireth to end the war between man and dragon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500050_MIDGARDSORMR<tab><var 08 E905 ((Sie)) ((Er)) /var> will den endlosen Krieg beenden. Diese schwere Bürde nahm <var 08 E905 ((sie)) ((er)) /var> auf sich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500060_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Millennia have passed since I was brought low by the men of Allag. To think that war rageth still between our kinds...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500060_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Über all die Zeit, seit mich die Allager hier fesselten, tobte in Eorzea also der Krieg weiter ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500070_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Hearken to my tale, child of man. I am Tiamat, of Midgardsormr's first brood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500070_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Mein Name ist Tiamat, der ins Vergessen entschwundene Drache.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500080_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)In a time before time, my father did come to this star, bearing seven eggs.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500080_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Am Anbeginn der Zeit, als dieses Gestirn gerade geboren war, kam mein Vater und brachte sieben Eier mit sich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500090_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>From these eggs did my children hatch. And once they were full-grown, they took wing and spread across all the lands of Hydaelyn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500090_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Zu sieben starken Kindern wuchsen sie heran - die Hohen Drachen nennt ihr sie. Sie flogen aus und ließen sich an verschiedenen Orten nieder.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500100_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Together with my brood-brother Bahamut, I journeyed south to Meracydia. And together, we brought forth innumerable children into the world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500100_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Mit meinem geliebten Bahamut flog ich nach Süden. Wir brachten in Meracydia zahlreiche Nachkommen zur Welt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500110_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)We abided in peace, and all was well...until the men of Allag came, some five thousand years since. They slaughtered my children in droves, and took from me my beloved Bahamut.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500110_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Doch vor fünftausend Jahren fiel der Stamm der Allager bei uns ein. Sie schlachteten meine Kinder ab und Bahamut nahmen sie mir auch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500120_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)'Twas then, when I had fallen into the depths of despair, that black-robed men came unto me. The Ascians.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500120_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Ich war von ohnmächtiger Trauer überwältigt. Da erschienen schwarz gewandete Gestalten, die sich Ascians nannten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500130_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)They offered to resurrect Bahamut through their dark arts, and I, in my grief, accepted─a decision which I shall regret unto my dying breath.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500130_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Ich schloss einen Pakt. Wenn nur Bahamut wieder lebte ...! Doch sie waren Verräter ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500140_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)For what they brought back was a mockery of my beloved. Worse, the Ascians gifted his murderers the means to entrap him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500140_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Hinter meinem Rücken unterwiesen sie die Allager in ihren bösen Lehren. Und so war Bahamut am Leben - doch auf ewig gefesselt in einem metallenen Verlies.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500150_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Know this, child of man: the beings thy kind call gods are but specters of thy mind's creation, given form at great cost to Hydaelyn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500150_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Hör mir zu. Die Wesen, die die Euren Götter nennen, sind nichts weiter als Trugbilder eurer Vor<var 16 /var>stel<var 16 /var>lungs<var 16 /var>kraft, denen auf Kosten von Hydaelyn Gestalt verliehen wird.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500160_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Many such beings yet slumber across the land, brought to heel by the selfsame empire that bound me. They must not be released into the world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500160_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)An diesen Ort stiegen unzählige Götter herab, um die Allager zu bezwingen. Doch sie alle wurden gefangen ... und niemand darf sie befreien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500170_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)If thou wouldst end the conflict, vanquish thee the Ascians, and deliver the weak of will from the bonds of their dark influence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500170_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Wenn ihr die Wurzel des Hasses ausmerzen wollt, dann haltet die Schwachen ab, sich an Götter zu klammern; und tötet die Blender, die ihre Sinne trüben: die Ascians.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500180_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>It hath been five thousand years, my child. Wilt thou not forgive thyself?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500180_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Tiamat, meine Tochter. Selbst nach fünftausend Jahren kannst du dir nicht verzeihen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500190_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)The release of death is denied me here, yet I desire not freedom. Nay, Father. I shall live with my regret until the world itself hath ceased to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500190_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Dies ist ein Kerker, der mir nicht einmal durch den Tod Erlösung gewährt. Aber ich wünsche nicht meine Freiheit. Nicht bis ans Ende aller Zeit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500200_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Such is my just punishment for consorting with Darkness─for calling forth a loathsome and lamentable creature which blackeneth my beloved's memory.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500200_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Meine Schuld wiegt zu schwer. Die unbändige Trauer gab mir ein, Bahamuts Seele zu rufen - zu verderben ... Niemals kann ich mir dies vergeben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600010_HYDAELYN<tab>Warrior of Light. Beloved <var 08 E905 ((daughter)) ((son)) /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600010_HYDAELYN<tab>Mein Kind ... <var 08 E905 ((Meine Kriegerin)) ((Mein Krieger)) /var> des Lichts ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600020_HYDAELYN<tab>The Light abideth within thy heart again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600020_HYDAELYN<tab>In dein Herz ist das Licht zurückgekehrt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600030_HYDAELYN<tab>Full valiantly didst thou overcome thy many trials.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600030_HYDAELYN<tab>Die Fessel ist gelöst, du hast deine Prüfung tapfer bestanden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600040_HYDAELYN<tab>But glory not in thy success.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600040_HYDAELYN<tab>Doch du musst achtsam bleiben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600050_HYDAELYN<tab>For the servants of Darkness are ever close at hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600050_HYDAELYN<tab>Denn die Diener der Dunkelheit sind unheilvoll nahe ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600060_HYDAELYN<tab>Receive of me my blessing once more,
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600060_HYDAELYN<tab>Dir ist das Licht aufs Neue geschenkt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600070_HYDAELYN<tab>And go forth, to shine thy Light on all creation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600070_HYDAELYN<tab>Mein Segen ist wieder mit dir. Bring der Welt das Licht ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700010_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Thou hast broken down the wall I built around thee, and partaken of thy mistress's blessing once more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700010_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Du hast also meine Klaue gelöst und Hydaelyns Segen wieder empfangen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700011_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Strong art thou, mortal─stronger than any other of thy kind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700011_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Seit Beginn meiner Existenz habe ich noch niemals ein Wesen mit so starkem Herzen gesehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Having looked upon thy deeds, I am convinced. Thou art worthy to bear Her Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Als ich auf dieser Welt zu neuem Leben erwachte, gelobte ich, Hydaelyn zu dienen. Nun will ich dir, <var 08 E905 ((ihrer Erwählten)) ((ihrem Erwählten)) /var>, beistehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700030_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>The covenant bound me to thee, but 'twould seem our fates were mingled from the first. Though I will not fight thy battles, I will yet lend thee my wings.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700030_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Deine Schlachten werde ich nicht schlagen, doch meine Flügel sollen deine sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Come, mortal─we go to cast out the Darkness!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Lass uns fliegen und die Dunkelheit vertreiben!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800010_LAHABREA<tab>The champion of Hydaelyn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800010_LAHABREA<tab>Hydaelyns Lakai ...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800020_IGEYOHRM<tab>Tell me: why do you despise the primals so?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800020_IGEYOHRM<tab>Sag, warum verabscheut ihr die Primae so?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800030_IGEYOHRM<tab>They are the embodiment of mortal will─of mortal desire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800030_IGEYOHRM<tab>Sie sind nur die Verkörperung sterblicher Sehnsüchte.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800040_IGEYOHRM<tab>Plainly, you <var 1A 02 /var>desire<var 1A 01 /var> a foe to despise. And 'tis well
that you do, for it is from the vortex of ceaseless conflict
that Lord Zodiark shall be reborn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800040_IGEYOHRM<tab>Offenbar <var 1A 02 /var>wollt<var 1A 01 /var> ihr einander hassen. Und das sollt ihr auch, denn aus dem Chaos, das die endlosen Kämpfe entfachen, wird Zodiark auferstehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800050_LAHABREA<tab>Through the Joining, the world shall become whole again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800050_LAHABREA<tab>Mit jeder Nova kommt das Universum seinem Urbild näher.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800060_LAHABREA<tab>Then all shall be as once it was─as it should ever have remained.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800060_LAHABREA<tab>Sind alle Welten vereint, beginnt die Schöpfung erneut!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800070_IGEYOHRM<tab>For the glory of Lord Zodiark.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800070_IGEYOHRM<tab>Für Zodiark.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800080_LAHABREA<tab>Your meddling ends here and now, Warrior of Light!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800080_LAHABREA<tab>Du warst ihm lange genug ein Hemmnis, <var 08 E905 ((Lichtkriegerin)) ((Lichtkrieger)) /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900010_LAHABREA<tab>Such strength! It defies all reason...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900010_LAHABREA<tab>Diese Stärke ist kaum vorstellbar!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900020_IGEYOHRM<tab>No! I will not be bested by the likes of them!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900020_IGEYOHRM<tab>Nein! Ich lasse mich nicht in die Knie zwingen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900030_IGEYOHRM<tab>Lahabrea! It is time!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900030_IGEYOHRM<tab>Lahabrea! Es ist Zeit!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900040_LAHABREA<tab>Very well. Let us show these mortals the true power of the Echo...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900040_LAHABREA<tab>Gut ... Lass uns den Sterblichen zeigen, was die Kraft des Transzendierens vermag ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900050_LAHABREA<tab>The power to break down the barriers of existence!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900050_LAHABREA<tab>Die Grenzen der Seele sind nicht mehr von Belang!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900060_IGEYOHRM<tab>I am become you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900060_IGEYOHRM<tab>Ich werde zu dir ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900070_LAHABREA<tab>...And we are become one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900070_LAHABREA<tab>... und wir sind vereint!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900080_ASCIANPRIME<tab>Come, mortals! Render up your souls, that Lord Zodiark might be reborn!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900080_ASCIANPRIME<tab>Opfert eure Seelen, Sterbliche, für Zodiarks Wiedergeburt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00010_ASCIANPRIME<tab>Aaargh!!!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00010_ASCIANPRIME<tab>Guuaaaaaaaarrrh!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00020_ASCIANPRIME<tab>What walls are these? Arrrgh! Damn you, Hydaelyn!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00020_ASCIANPRIME<tab>Hydaelyn!! Du zwingst mich in die Grenzen, aus denen mich Zodiark befreite?!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00030_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>That <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> might regain the blessing of Light I had foreseen...<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00030_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Dass <var 08 E905 ((sie)) ((er)) /var> Hydaelyns Kraft wiedererlangen würde, war ja vorherzusehen ...<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00040_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>But <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is grown so strong in it as to deny us our power.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00040_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Aber dass <var 08 E905 ((sie)) ((er)) /var> uns an der Entfaltung <var 1A 02 /var>unserer<var 1A 01 /var> Gabe hindern würde!<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00050_IGEYOHRM<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Let us withdraw, Lahabrea. That power remains to us, at least.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00050_IGEYOHRM<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Lass uns gehen, Lahabrea. <var 08 E905 ((Sie)) ((Er)) /var> hat nicht das Mittel, uns zu vernichten!<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00060_IGEYOHRM<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Impossible!<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00060_IGEYOHRM<tab>Waas ...?! Das ist unmöglich!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00070_IGEYOHRM<tab>Aaaaaahhh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00070_IGEYOHRM<tab>Gguuuaaaaaaaaarh!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00080_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>So you harnessed the Eye's power... A pity you spent it all. What will you do now, hero?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00080_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Mit einem Drachen<var 16 /var>auge wolltest du dein Glück versuchen? Tja, zu schade, dass es damit nun vorbei ist!<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00090_THORDAN<tab>So, not even the vaunted Warrior of Light can unmake an Ascian without relying upon mortal contrivances.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00090_THORDAN<tab>Selbst <var 08 E905 ((die Kriegerin)) ((der Krieger)) /var> des Lichts, mit Hydaelyns Kraft gesegnet, kann einen Ascian nur mit äußerster Mühe vernichten ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00100_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>You!<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00100_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Thordan?!<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00110_THORDAN<tab>In the distant past, King Thordan and his knights twelve fought and defeated Nidhogg.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00110_THORDAN<tab>Vor langer, langer Zeit zwangen König Thordan und seine Ritter den Hohen Drachen Nidhogg in die Knie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00120_THORDAN<tab>Though the victory cost them dear, they were rewarded with a great prize: the dread wyrm's eyes, both of which have since been held in the Holy See's safekeeping.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00120_THORDAN<tab>Sie verloren viel, aber erlangten weit mehr: Sie raubten ihm beide Augen, die die Kurie seit damals sicher verwahrt ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00130_THORDAN<tab>The Eye you possess was Nidhogg's left, and long has it served as the source of the Azure Dragoon's might. As for its twin...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00130_THORDAN<tab>Du besitzt das linke Auge des Drachen, das den Azur-Drachenreitern seit jeher ihre Kraft verleiht ... Doch wo, meinst du, ist das rechte?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00140_THORDAN<tab>It has lain here, joined to the person of Haldrath, the first Azure Dragoon. For though he learned to harness its power, he was ultimately consumed by it. Even in death, his body decays not─a pitiful end for a fabled hero.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00140_THORDAN<tab>Es ist hier, fest mit dem Körper Haldraths verschmolzen - dem ersten Azur-Drachenreiter. Das Auge verlieh ihm seine Kraft, doch am Ende wurde er von ihm verschlungen. Das Leben ist lange aus seinem Körper gewichen, und doch verfällt die Leiche nicht ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00150_THORDAN<tab>My Ascian friend. Long have you and your kind sown the seeds of chaos by teaching mortals the secrets of summoning.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00150_THORDAN<tab>Lahabrea, mein Freund ... Ihr Ascians, Boten eures dunklen Gottes - ihr sät eine böse Saat. Das Verlangen nach Rache gebt ihr uns ein und lehrt uns die Götterbeschwörung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00160_THORDAN<tab>But if you assumed that we would meekly serve as your pawns, then you are gravely mistaken.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00160_THORDAN<tab>Ihr meint, alles arbeitet für euch auf euer großes Ziel zu ... Aber da seid ihr im Irrtum.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00170_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>You would raise a hand against us!?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00170_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Du niederträchtiger Heuchler!<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00180_THORDAN<tab>By taking unto my flesh the soul of the legendary King Thordan, I am become a god─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00180_THORDAN<tab>Der legendäre König Thordan ... in mir zum Gott erhöht!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00190_THORDAN<tab>A god who knows not cessation, whose being is sustained by a millennium of fervent prayer and the Eye's nigh-bottomless reservoir of aether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00190_THORDAN<tab>Ein ewiger, unsterblicher Gott ... Erfleht von Gebeten, die zahllose Seelen über tausend Jahre in Ver<var 16 /var>zweif<var 16 /var>lung sprachen; genährt vom gewaltigen Äther, der sich in Nidhoggs Augen konzentriert.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00200_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>What!?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00200_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Ewiger ... Gott?!<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00210_THORDAN<tab>Your contempt for man has proven your undoing, Ascian. For my first act as god-king, I do hereby sentence you to die.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00210_THORDAN<tab>Du hast uns unterschätzt, Ascian.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00220_LAHABREA<tab>Aaaaaargggh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00220_LAHABREA<tab>Gguuuaaaaaaaaarh!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00230_THORDAN<tab>Gods feed upon aether. It matters not what form that aether takes. Ascian souls are no exception. With this power, I shall put an end to a thousand years of conflict.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00230_THORDAN<tab>Äther ... Alles kehrt zu dieser Reinform aller Substanz zurück. Selbst eine Ascian-Seele.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00240_THORDAN<tab>Be they sown by Ascian, dragon, or primal, wheresoever the seeds of chaos threaten to quicken, I shall excise them with my divine blade and bring order to the world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00240_THORDAN<tab>Ascians, Drachen, Götzen ... Alles, was die Flammen des Krieges schürt, alles, was Zwietracht sät, wird durch meine heilige Klinge zerspalten. Endlich wird diese Welt Frieden finden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00250_THORDAN<tab>I am become that which you abhor, Warrior of Light. If you would take issue with my godhood, I shall answer you with my blade.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00250_THORDAN<tab>Komm, <var 08 E905 ((Lichtkriegerin)) ((Lichtkrieger)) /var>. Ich bin zu einem der Wesen geworden, die du so sehr verabscheust. Wenn du deinem Hass Luft machen willst, so ergreif diese Gelegenheit ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00010_ZEPHIRIN<tab>Brothers! The time is come to call upon the true power of the Heavens' Ward!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00010_ZEPHIRIN<tab>Brüder! Es ist Zeit, die Kraft der Azurgarde zu offenbaren!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00020_THORDAN<tab>Fight me if you will, Warrior of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00020_THORDAN<tab>Versuch dein Glück, <var 08 E905 ((Kriegerin)) ((Krieger)) /var> des Lichts!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00030_THORDAN<tab>I care not. All who stand against me will be destroyed─
be they servants of the Darkness or the Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00030_THORDAN<tab>Doch gegen den ewigen Gott wirst du nicht bestehen. Ich dulde weder Diener des Lichts noch der Dunkelheit.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00040_THORDAN<tab>By my blessing shall all men be sanctified, and an endless era
of peace begin. Vice and conflict shall cease to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00040_THORDAN<tab>Nur ich alleine bringe dem Volk den Segen. Mir werden ihre Seelen folgen, mein Wort wird sie leiten.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00050_THORDAN<tab>You reject my divinity, yet what have you to offer
my people in its stead? Bitter truth? Virtuous suffering?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00050_THORDAN<tab>Was hast du meinem göttlichen Plan entgegenzusetzen? Wahrheit um der Wahrheit willen? 
Endlose Opfer von höchst zweifelhaftem Wert?

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00060_THORDAN<tab>No matter. If you believe your cause just,
I call upon you to defend it with your life!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00060_THORDAN<tab>Hah! Doch wenn du an deine Sache glaubst, dann verteidige sie - mit deinem eigenen Leben!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00010_THORDAN<tab>How...how can this be? A millennium of prayer
and the Eye's power combined─and still you stand?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00010_THORDAN<tab>Du willst der Welt den Frieden verweigern - um deiner „Wahrheit“ willen? Soll das Leben Tausender durch dein Ethos der Ehrlichkeit zerstört werden?!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00020_THORDAN<tab>Who─<var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var> are you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00020_THORDAN<tab>Was bist du für <var 08 E905 ((eine Närrin)) ((ein Narr)) /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00030_ESTINIEN<tab>...It is over, then? I had hoped that mine would be the hand to end it...but knowing you, there was little chance of that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00030_ESTINIEN<tab>Dann ist das Ende also gekommen. Leider nicht durch meine Hand.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00040_ESTINIEN<tab>'Twould seem the Eye has served you well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00040_ESTINIEN<tab>Meine Leihgabe. Schön, dass sie dir von Nutzen war.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00050_ESTINIEN<tab>Its twin... At long last...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00050_ESTINIEN<tab>Das zweite Auge. Endlich sind sie beide in meiner Hand ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00060_ESTINIEN<tab>All that remains is to take them beyond the reach of man and dragon both. With this task accomplished, my toils shall finally be at an end.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00060_ESTINIEN<tab>Nun muss ich nur noch dafür sorgen, dass weder Ishgarder noch Drachen sie jemals wieder finden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00070_NIDHOGG<tab>Thou hadst done well to resist mine influence, bathed in my power and blood as thou wert.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00070_NIDHOGG<tab>Lange hast du meiner Kraft widerstanden, obwohl du mein Auge am Leibe trugst und in meinem Blut gebadet hast.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00080_NIDHOGG<tab>Alas, in thine anticipation of comfort, thou hast lowered thy guard!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00080_NIDHOGG<tab>Aber schließlich wuchs in dir ein Wunsch, Drachenreiter! Die Last möge von dir genommen werden, endlich möge man dir Ruhe gönnen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00090_NIDHOGG<tab>The keening of my fallen kindred... Their smoldering desire for vengeance...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00090_NIDHOGG<tab>Tief in deinem Herzen schwelte das Verlangen nach Rache ... hallte noch immer das Wehgeschrei der Opfer nach, die du im Drachenkrieg sterben sahst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00100_NIDHOGG<tab>Mine eyes have partaken of a thousand years of pain─a pain which I shall bestow upon thee.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00100_NIDHOGG<tab>Mein Auge hat alles gesehen, alles ... Lass mich den Anblick mit dir teilen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00110_NIDHOGG<tab>Drink deep of my rage, mortal...AND BECOME ME!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00110_NIDHOGG<tab>Nimm meinen Zorn tief in dich auf, Sterblicher ... und werde zu mir!!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00120_ESTINIEN<tab>Grrraaarrrgh!!!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00120_ESTINIEN<tab>Ngaaaaaaahh ...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00130_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Nidhogg, my child... What hath thy fury made of thee...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00130_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Nidhogg, mein Sohn ... Was hat der Hass aus dir gemacht?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00140_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Let us away, servant of Hydaelyn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00140_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Schnell, <var 08 E905 ((Botin)) ((Bote)) /var> Hydaelyns!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00010_WEDGE<tab>Chief! Over there!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00010_WEDGE<tab>Chef! Sieh mal da!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00020_BIGGS<tab>Oi!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00020_BIGGS<tab>Heeee! Hierher!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00030_CID<tab>Haha! Godsdammit, do you always have to cut it so bloody close!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00030_CID<tab><var 08 E905 ((Sie)) ((Er)) /var> macht's aber auch jedes Mal spannend ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00040_YSHTOLA<tab>It would seem <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> has done it again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00040_YSHTOLA<tab><var 08 E905 ((Sie)) ((Er)) /var> hat es also geschafft ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Was there ever any doubt?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Daran haben wir doch nie gezweifelt, oder?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Let us return to Ishgard. Our friends will be eager to learn the battle's outcome...and welcome back their champion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lasst uns nach Ishgard zurückkehren. Alle warten auf die triumphale Rückkehr <var 08 E905 ((unserer Heldin)) ((unseres Helden)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00070_YSHTOLA<tab>Where is Estinien?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00070_YSHTOLA<tab>Wo ist Estinien ...?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00010_AYMERIC<tab>I daresay you are the first soul in Ishgardian history to arrive in our city upon dragonback. This scene shall be remembered for a thousand years to come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00010_AYMERIC<tab>Du bist wohl <var 08 E905 ((die)) ((der)) /var> Allererste, <var 08 E905 ((die)) ((der)) /var> jemals auf dem Rücken eines Drachen in unsere Stadt zurückgekehrt ist. Dieser Tag wird in die Geschichte eingehen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>As we had feared, the archbishop summoned the soul of King Thordan unto himself and thence became a primal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Es ist geschafft. Wir haben Papst Thordan aufgehalten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00030_YSHTOLA<tab>But he and his knights are no more, thanks to the Warrior of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00030_YSHTOLA<tab><var 08 E905 ((Die Kriegerin)) ((Der Krieger)) /var> des Lichts, um genau zu sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Your struggles are not yet over, mortals.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Noch ist nicht alles vorbei, Kinder Isghards.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00050_AYMERIC<tab>Whom do I have the pleasure...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00050_AYMERIC<tab>Mit wem haben wir die Ehre?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00060_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>I am Midgardsormr. I have journeyed with Hydaelyn's champion and observed <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> deeds in the conflict between man and dragon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00060_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Ich bin Midgardsormr, der erste Drache. Ich habe Hydaelyns <var 08 E905 ((Kriegerin)) ((Krieger)) /var> begleitet und <var 08 E905 ((ihre)) ((seine)) /var> Taten im Kampf zwischen unseren Völkern beobachtet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00070_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Tell me, children of Thordan. Do you desire peace?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00070_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Sagt mir, Kinder Thordans: Wollt ihr den Frieden mit den Drachen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00080_AYMERIC<tab>My people have committed unspeakable atrocities against dragonkind─even against our own. Would that we could undo these wrongs...but we cannot.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00080_AYMERIC<tab>Mein Volk hat un<var 16 /var>beschreib<var 16 /var>liche Verbrechen gegen das Eure begangen - und gegen unser eigenes. Ich wünschte,  ich könnte all dies ungeschehen machen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00090_AYMERIC<tab>Be that as it may, the future yet presents a chance to begin anew. Our nation has broken free of the shackles of a false faith, and Nidhogg shall lead his kindred against us no more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00090_AYMERIC<tab>Es fällt schwer, solch abscheuliche Taten zu vergessen, und so denke ich, dass wir uns alle erinnern müssen. Ich habe das Lügengebäude zerstört, das meine Ahnen für unser Volk errichteten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00100_AYMERIC<tab>I doubt not that it will require much effort and perseverance, but 'tis my belief that, in time, Ishgard will again become a place where man and dragon may abide together in harmony.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00100_AYMERIC<tab>Nidhogg, der den Feldzug für die Euren führte, ist gefallen. Wir haben viele Opfer zu beklagen, doch ich bin überzeugt davon, dass wir alle in diesem Land in Frieden zusammenleben können - Ishgarder wie Drachen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00110_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>I shall remember thy words.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00110_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Ich werde deine Worte nicht vergessen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00120_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Yet be warned: Nidhogg's soul liveth on.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00120_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Aber bedenke, dass Nidhoggs Seele noch fortlebt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00130_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>His unbridled rage hath claimed for its vessel the one thou callest the Azure Dragoon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00130_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Euer Azur-Drachenreiter ist gefallen. Nidhoggs rachsüchtiger Geist ist in ihm. <var 1A 02 /var>Er<var 1A 01 /var> ist nun der Drache.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00140_AYMERIC<tab>Estinien!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00140_AYMERIC<tab>Estinien?!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00150_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Doubt not but that Nidhogg will call out to his brood ere long, nor that they shall answer him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00150_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Nidhogg wird die Seinen bald wieder rufen, und sie werden ihm folgen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00160_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Steel yourselves, for the true test is yet to come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00160_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Der Krieg ist noch nicht vorüber. Eure wahre Prüfung steht erst bevor.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00170_AYMERIC<tab>Come what may, we will never cease to believe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00170_AYMERIC<tab>Ich werde nicht aufgeben, noch wird mein Volk das tun.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00180_AYMERIC<tab>Upon the souls of they who have sacrificed themselves to pave the way for peace, we will never abandon our cause.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00180_AYMERIC<tab>Für all jene, die in der Hoffnung auf eine bessere Zukunft starben, und um unserer Freunde Seelen willen werden wir den Frieden erreichen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00190_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>A thousand-year war cannot be ended in a day. It may take generations. What thou dost begin, thy children must continue.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00190_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Ein tausendjähriger Krieg findet kein so schnelles Ende. Sieh zu, dass deine Überzeugung Generation um Generation weitergegeben wird.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00200_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Entrust unto them thy hopes and dreams, that peace may reign again...and forevermore.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00200_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Dann wird am Horizont eine Zukunft erscheinen, die von Licht und Harmonie erfüllt ist.
